this.Bump = function(evt)
Moves a given event to the front of the queue.
this.ConvertToMime=function(toMime,
converter)
Attempts to use the converter of this data object to morph it into a new mime-type, which can be used in order to transform this.data into a new value.
this.ConvertToMime = function(toMime,
obj,
fromUrl,
inPlace)
Attempts to convert and object to a given mime-type.
HTMLTextAreaElement.prototype.find=function(pattern,
wrap)
Attempt to find a pattern in this TextArea and highlight it.
this.Flush = function()
Attempt to perform all the events in the queue from first priority to last priority.
GetCharacter = function(data)
Attempts to resolve an object into a human readable character (or whitespace) by keyCode.
GetCSSValueInUnits=function(elem,
property,
unit)
Attempts to find a property of an element’s style in a specified unit.
GetShifted = function(unicodeChar)
Attempts to return the alternative of a character is the shift key was toggled from its original form.
this.GuessMime = function(data,
url)
Attempts to determine the mime-type of an object.
this.HoldEvents = function(pushFilter)
Prevents any more events from being executed until the hold is released.
OnLoaded: function(callback)
When loading scripts that require other scripts it is often the case that those scripts are used in initialization.
this.PushEvent = function(evt)
Put an event on the queue at the last priority.
this.RegisterConversion = function(mime,
toMime,
func)
Attempts to add a conversion to the MimeConverter that can be used to convert from one mime-type to another.
this.RegisterMime = function(mime,
fileExtensions)
Attempts to register the mime-type as being associated with a file extension
this.ReleaseHold = function(holdId)
Releases a hold on this queue and allows events to flow naturally again.
HTMLTextAreaElement.prototype.replace=function(txt)
Attempt to replace the current selection with a given text and highlight the replacement.
Require : function(url,
force)
Used in order to load a script at a given url and evaluate it with some minor protection.
function ResolveUri(base,
target)
Takes a base URI and resolves a relative URI against it.
HTMLTextAreaElement.prototype.scrollToChar=function(index)
Attempt to move the TextArea’s view port to have the character index (0 based) at the top.
HTMLTextAreaElement.prototype.scrollToLine=function(line)
Attempt to move the TextArea’s view port to have the specified line at the top.
this.UnshiftEvent = function(evt)
Put an event on the queue at the first priority.
